descriptionHtml:
This is a big one! A bunch of lovely ladies to assist you in your endeavours, including a couple vamps and a half- vamp, an ex - soldier,  a former bandit turned crusader,  and an aristocratic Dunmer mage! 

For the time being these followers will be all together,  I'm strongly  considering splitting them into two seperate groups of three , let me know if that's something you'd want :)

The rundown:

Margaux Volaire

Nord vampire, Lord Harkon's most loyal agent and spy, sent to locate supplies and human 'cattle' for the needs of Castle Volkihar.
author: Gman749
